Reviews.Title: My LGL85C
Reviews.Author: Christian D. Wuerth "Samsung Proclaim"
Reviews.Content: It was initial price. Then, I found this phone to be old technology. That would explain why it came down from $330 to $100, the only thing was it was further reduced in price to $65. The seller and I reached an agrement. Still though it has a front facing camera and a rear, which makes Skype possible. I added a 32mg card for storage and of course alot of applicatipions and works great!

Reviews.Title: nice phone
Reviews.Author: Edward Johnson
Reviews.Content: bought it for my wife and she loves it. It has all of the bells and whistles that she wanted in a phone.

Reviews.Title: bad phone
Reviews.Author: Lora LaShay Corpening
Reviews.Content: The phone doesn have good signal it roams, it also freezes up a lot as well have to keep restarting it.

Reviews.Title: Terrible Phone
Reviews.Author: Anthony
Reviews.Content: i spend 150 dollars on this phone thinking it was a top brand phone when it is a horrible phone. I have many problems with it. problems:1.Very Laggy all the time.2. freezes and have to take battery out and put back in once a day.3. has typing problems key board freezes and have to restart phone for it to work.4. has alot of trouble staying connected to wifi.5. very sensitive push one button and 5 go off at the same time.Overall im very displeased and would have returned i had knew i only had a month to return it very poor phone for price.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: DEEJAYNIGHT
Reviews.Content: I had this phone 2 years ago and now I have it once again in 2014 and I love it works great I don't know why people keeps on complaining about the battery just don't use the phone to much I bet you people use the phone all day long smh appreciate the phone okay people God :)
